messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My dream’s a big one!I want to battle every kind of Pokémon
from around the world!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I lost, but I am one step closer to
realizing my dream!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Listen, you! Whatever happens, never
lose sight of your dream!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
All right, you!Help me realize my dream of battling
every kind of Pokémon there is!
